snippet.title: Astromeda | Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
ASTROMEDA is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria race.

👩🏻‍🚀 Wishlist on Steam  ➡ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2560210/Astromeda/
 
Dive deep into the world of Astromeda, full of lovable, quirky characters, along with unique gameplay mechanics. The fusion of real-time fast-paced and turn-based combat offers an exhilarating experience that is easy to get hooked on!

Try out the demo of this Undertale and Hollow Knight inspired RPG, and wishlist it!

Follow the game's socials and join the Discord! 👍 
➽ Twitter: https://twitter.com/astromeda_game
➽ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HwyB6XM

#Astromeda #rpg
